name: Smart Thermostat
description: $40-$60 rebate on programmable smart thermostat; home must have AC and gas furnace; must replace non-smart thermostat
fullDescription: Golden State Rebates offers instant discounts on smart thermostats at participating retailers, helping Californians save energy with programmable temperature control.
whatTheyOffer:
- $40-$60 instant discount at checkout
- No rebate forms to submit
- Popular brands like Nest, ecobee, Honeywell
- Helps reduce heating/cooling costs
- Remote control via smartphone
- Available at major retailers
howToGetIt:
1. Home must have AC and gas furnace
2. Must replace non-smart thermostat
3. Find participating retailer on website
4. Shop for qualifying smart thermostat
5. Discount applied automatically at checkout
6. No paperwork required
keywords: Golden State Rebates, smart thermostat, Nest, ecobee, Honeywell, $40, $60, instant discount, programmable, energy savings
